name: Lost Sea
description: After a freak storm over the Atlantic, you find yourself stranded on the shores of a mysterious island. Do you have what it takes to escape the Lost Sea?
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP/Vista/7/8.1/10 Processor: Dual Core Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: GeForce 460 DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 2 GB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7/8.1/10 Processor: Quad Core Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: GeForce 650 or better DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 2 GB available space
